trigger.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: If you have 2 or less Life cards, play this card and K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: If you have 2 or less Life cards, play this card and K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

meta.notes: Card is marked as a 'SAMPLE' and has 'SPECIAL' rarity indicator, but the printed ID is OP08-113 and rarity is SP. The '4000' is power, not life. The trigger text is fully legible.
